review: Great gadget - but, my internet service is soooo slow through Hughesnet that I cannot stream video through Netflix without it locking up and pausing for foreeevvvveeeeerrrrr.  But, when showing other items on my laptop - it's awesome!  Thank you, Google!
author: Marie Belinowski

review: Great potential....when it works, it only does this on its on demands and i have never been able to figure out what is the reason for that. Connection issues all the time
author: Todor Jelev "Tony Jelev"

review: I had debated this product as I had Apple TV and WD Live, however, I am now moving into the Android arena with an Android tablet, phone and a Chromebook.  It is great and I mean really great how I can stream out so much media from one of these devices to the Chromecast.  You just can't go wrong, especially with this being so inexpensive!!  I have one, looking for a deal on another!Highly recommend it.
author: Mike Callery

review: So it's a simple Google product which does well what it has promised. Cast your Google Chrome window to the TV or things like playing Youtube.This is not a negative feedback towards the advertisement of the product but rather a wish for feedback: Definitely needs to integrate with media players like VLC Player. When that happens, this will be a 5 star product.
author: Basar K. "-Basar"

review: Really nice gadget. Simple, easy to install and lets me stream my contents from smartphone and pc to my tv.
author: Patrick Martinez
